description: geth normal sync option

defaultMessage: Congratulations, you are a pioneer synchronizing with the Ethereum test network! We recommend Normal Sync with the Express setup but the brave ones can also choose the (very) experimental Light Sync! :)

description: Message to show when synchronizing
defaultMessage: 同期が完了するとすぐにログインできます。そしてAKASHAを使って今まで体験したことのない素晴らしい経験ができます! 楽しんでください！！！ 私たちは向こう側で待っています! o/

description: Message to show after synchronization has finished
defaultMessage:
Synchronization is complete. IPFS service needs to be started in order to
                        continue. You can start it manually from the status bar in the header or
                        click NEXT to start it automatically.

description: placeholder message shown if no local profiles were found
defaultMessage: IDをインポートする際はこのリンクを参照してください

description: finding peers
message to display when geth and IPFS services are about to start
default message to display in sync status
message to display when synchronization is in default state
number of peers connected
defaultMessage: {peerCount, number} {peerCount, plural, one {peer} few {peer} many {peer} other {peer}}, {peerCount, plural, one {接続済み} other {接続済み}}

description: details button label
message to be displayed when geth is stopped and profiles cannot be loaded
defaultMessage:
Geth service is not working. Please start it manually in order to fetch
                        your profiles.

description: message to be displayed when ipfs is stopped and profiles cannot be loaded
defaultMessage:
IPFS service is stopped. Please start it manually in order to fetch
                        your profiles.

description: title for tutorial Modal
defaultMessage: 始める前のアドバイス

description: text for tutorial Modal
defaultMessage:
このdapp(分散型アプリケーション) はテスト用のETH"Ether"のみを使用しています。
あなたのイーサリアムをin-dappアドレスに送金しないようにしてください。

description: text for tutorial Modal
defaultMessage:
このdapp(分散型アプリケーション) を使用するには Manafied AETH (Mana) が必要です。
画面右上にあるあなたのAETH balanceの"Transform tab"の中にある"Manafy"を選択するとManaを入手できます。

description: text for tutorial Modal
defaultMessage: Alternatively, you can click the sidebar Mana indicator next to your avatar photo and choose Shift up.
